description.narrative: This activity (Project Management Office Cost) is a component of Global Knowledge on Climate Change Adapttion: Lessons from China reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £471,036. This component benefits Asia, regional, and works in the following sector(s): Environmental policy and administrative management. The start date is 25-10-2010 and the end date is 30-06-2012.
